text: Please read these terms carefully. By using this Service, you agree that you have read, understood, accepted and agreed with the Terms and Conditions.

Passengers are prohibited from uploading any disturbing or abusive profile picture.

Driver must have a valid driving license.
During registration period information provided by driver must have to be true, accurate and up-to-date.
After accepting passengers request driver should not reject any ride request without any valid reason.
Driver will responsible for all claims, and liabilities resulting from any accident, loss or damage.

Drivers are prohibited from uploading any disturbing or abusive profile picture.
Under any circumstance no 1 way car personnel are bound to disclose any Drivers information, things can only be considered if any legal or critical issue turns up.

Driver will not use the application for sending or storing any illegal material or for deceitful intention.

If any information provided by the driver is false, incorrect or incomplete in any respect, 1 way car authority has the right to terminate agreement any time with or without any notice.
If a driver has been panelized and 1 way car has enough evidence to prove that penalty valid then driver is bound to pay that penalty amount.
According to the agreement, driver must pay daily ride commission to 1 way car.
Driver will obey all local laws related to the operation of passenger transport and/or delivery services and will be solely responsible for any violations of such local laws;
Driver will not use the Application for sending or storing any unlawful material or for fraudulent purposes;
Driver will keep secure and confidential your account password or any identification we provide you which allows access to the Service;
Driver will not contact the Customers for purposes other than the Service;
Driver is aware that when responding to Passengers’ or Customers’ requests for transportation services, standard telecommunication charges will apply and which shall be solely borne by Driver;
